result.execSummary:
The defendant Cory Allen Sutarik was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Take/Drive Veh. w/o Consent-Abandon Veh., a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.23(3m).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Ashland County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes:
Def to report to the DOC in Ashland within 24 hours!
If def is placed on probation or extended supervision & owes financial obligations ordered by the Court at the time of discharge, a civil judgment may be entered against the def for all unpaid financial obligations.
  While on supervision the Def is to pay their financial obligations thru the Clerk of Court, which may include payments on restitution, fines, costs, surcharges, etc that are court ordered.
The payments are to be paid directly to the Clerk of Court Office at:
Ashland Co Clerk of Circuit Court
201 Main Street West - Room 307
Ashland, WI  54806

miscConds.notes: The Def is to obtain counseling as directed by DOC at the expense of the Def.

Defendant shall not possess/consume alcoholic beverages, illegal drugs, drug paraphernalia or any mind altering substances (MAS).  MAS means alcoholic beverages, controlled substances other than those prescribed by treating physician to the Def & taken only as prescribed, inhalants, synthetic marijuana or a similar substance, and/or over-the-counter medications used contrary to label instructions.  THE DEFENDANT IS TO MAINTAIN ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.
The Defendant shall not enter any bars, taverns, liquor stores (any place where the primary purpose is the sale of alcohol) where mind altering substances are consumed. Not to be present where illegal controlled substances are possessed. 
  The Def is subject to random UA testing.
NO CONTACT  with known drug user/dealers except in treatment.
  The Def is to provide a DNA specimen to the Ashland County Jail within 7 days.
Undergo alcohol/drug assessment and complete recommended treatment-responsible for finding the funding for any treatment/counseling recommended.

timeConds.notes:
Credit for Time Served To Be Determined
Defendant to contact the Ashland County Jail within 7 days to set up time to begin serving sentence.
Granted Work Release.
Jail time may be replaced by 80 hours of community service completed within the first 60 days. Proper documentation is to be provided to the Ashland County Jail, the Department of Corrections, the Ashland County Clerk of Courts office and the Ashland County District Attorney's office.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Cory Allen Sutarik

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

ADDRESS INFO for Cory Allen Sutarik
Current: 121 n15th Ave E, Ashland, WI 54806 United States  (Effective: 10-12-2017)
Prior: 405 13th Avenue East, Ashland, WI 54806

Defendant Cory Allen Sutarik in court with attorney Joseph Stephen Hoffmann.  Kelly J Mcknight appeared for the State of Wisconsin. PRH 16CM78,77. 17CM11 Ct rec offer to settle, plq, and notice, plea NC to ct 1 20 days jail $10 fine plus costs and DNA. Parties state this is the agreement. Plea NC. Ct finds know/vol plea, understands rights, ct accepts plea and finds guilty mftr. DA provides letter for DOC, prior convictions, option of CS instead of jail. Atty Hoffmann comments asks for sentence on electronic monitor. DA comments not agreement, Atty Hoffmann retracts request. Def asks for extension for time to report. Was late to report to jail by 2 months had to be arrested. Judgement sent of court 20 days jail no CTS, 12 days will be in jail, 8 days on electronic mon under house arrest., good time, work release, contact jail 7 days to set up time to begin serving sentence and DNA, begin serving 60 days from today. $488.88 
Comments on probation review hearing, letter from agent good in many ways, no prob holds, also no fin payments, bad faith fin obligations, probation extended one year.  Working at Deltco, income assignment $50 biweekly.
of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief

Attorney Mark L Perrine in court.  Kelly J Mcknight appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Cases 16CM77,78,97. Def appr late 9:06pm.  Plea to count 1 16cm77, ct2 in 16CM78 all other counts and 16CM97 DRI. WH 12 mo prob, 10 days jail or 80 hrs CS. AODA, no MAS not present, UA, NC known drug user/dealer, couns, $10 fine plus costs, DNA. 
Atty Perrine/Def this is the agreement.  Plea NC. 16CM78 Ct 1 and 16CM97 DRI.
Ct accpets pleas and finds def Guilty.
State has complied with victim rights. 
WH 12 mo prob, report 24 hrs, 16CM77 10 days jail CTS TBD, work release, contact jail 7 days for DNA and set up time to begin serving, begin serving 11/15/16 9am, Jail time may be replaced by 80 hours CS w/in first 60 days. Proper documentation. AODA, ABSOL no MAS, rx as pres, not present MAS consumed, not present illegal cont sub possess, UA, NC with drug user/dealer except treatment, couns, 16CM77 $499.38 16CM78 $488.88. Pay through COC, add to payment plan. Review 9 months from now.

Defendant Cory Allen Sutarik in court with attorney Mark L Perrine.  Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.Cases 16Cm77,78,97. Atty Perrine agreement on def cases.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 14, 2016 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Cory Allen Sutarik in court with attorney Mark L Perrine.  Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 16CM77,16CM78,16CM97, Atty Perrine req 2-3 week adj.  Status conference scheduled for September 6, 2016 at 11:00 am.

Attorney Mark L Perrine in court.  Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Perrine, Def in treatment, asks for adj. DAP  Status conference scheduled for August 15, 2016 at 01:45 pm.

Attorney Mark L Perrine in court.  Kelly J Mcknight appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Auth filed in each case Rec copy of each compl, stands mute. Bail set in 16CM97, DA SB, Ct orders $1000 SB. SB sent to ACSD needs to sign bond and get fingerprinted on 16CM97 by Friday 6/9. Stands Mute in each case.  DAP  Status conference scheduled for July 18, 2016 at 01:45 pm.

Def appear via v/con from jail. not working Lives with Tommy Perdilla. Has lived there for 2-3 weeks. $2000 sign. bond no contact with Ashland Walmart, no contact face to face with roger or Roxanne Marincel unless they agree in writing.
Defendant Cory Allen Sutarik not in court. BOW ff bail/bond each case
